item.title: Citizens upgrades this cloud computing stock on hyperscale outsourcing optimism
item.description: Shares of CoreWeave could see a sizable boost over the coming months as demand for hyperscalers ramps up, Citizens said on Tuesday.

item.title: This tech upstart is going after a piece of Nvidia's AI business, says Needham
item.description: Analyst Ryan Koontz, who has a buy rating on the network equipment name, increased his price target on Tuesday.

item.title: Here are Tuesday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Apple, Ferrari, Tesla, CoreWeave, Hershey's, Ferrari, Dell and more
item.description: Here are Tuesday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

item.title: Webtoon shares jump more than 25% on deal to create digital comics platform for Disney's Marvel and Star Wars
item.description: Disney and Webtoon on Monday announced plans for a new digital platform that will house brands such as Marvel and Star Wars.

item.title: An options trade on Starbucks with the stock oversold and due for a bounce
item.description: Options trader Nishant Pant goes through this bull call spread on Starbucks.
